experiences.title: President at Entrepreneurship Cell
description: Led student government representing 15,000+ undergraduate students
Organized campus-wide events and initiatives improving student life
Collaborated with university administration on policy changes
Managed annual budget of $500,000 for student activities
experiences.impact: Successfully advocated for extended library hours and improved campus Wi-Fi infrastructure

experiences.title: Startup Co-Ordinator for the Campus
experiences.organization: BITS Pilani, Institution's Innovation Council (Govt of India Initiative)
description: Conducted research on machine learning algorithms under Dr. Sarah Johnson
Developed predictive models for analyzing large datasets
Co-authored research paper published in IEEE conference
Presented findings at undergraduate research symposium
experiences.impact: Research contributed to 20% improvement in prediction accuracy for traffic flow optimization

experiences.title: Teaching Assistant
description: Provided one-on-one tutoring for introductory programming courses
Helped students understand fundamental programming concepts
Developed supplementary learning materials and practice exercises
Maintained 95% student satisfaction rate across 100+ sessions
experiences.impact: Helped improve average student grades by 1.2 GPA points in tutored courses

experiences.title: Startup Co-Founder
description: Coordinated volunteer activities for local community service projects
Organized weekly food drives and homeless shelter assistance
Recruited and managed team of 50+ student volunteers
Established partnerships with 10 local non-profit organizations
experiences.impact: Facilitated 500+ hours of community service and collected 2,000+ pounds of food donations
